findings.title: Tokens can be issued additionally without restrictions
findings.description: Owner can issue tokens additionally without restrictions by calling the _ROBOCOIN#mint()_ function.

findings.title: Even when the address is locked, tokens can be transferred using the ERC20#transferFrom() function.
findings.description: Tokens in a blacklisted address can still be transferred using ERC20#transferFrom() function despite being locked.

findings.title: There is a missing Event.
findings.description: When an Event is missing, it is difficult to identify in real-time whether an accurate value is recorded on the blockchain.
